com.btmatthews.utils.monitor

Interface ServerFactory


  • public interface ServerFactory
    This interface is implemented by factories that create server objects that can be controlled by a monitor.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Brian Matthews

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Server createServer()
      Create a server object.
      String getServerName()
      Get the server name.
